Local Chassis

Local Chassis is a container for modules and I/O that is directly accessible from your controller (such as a CompactRIO chassis). Use # Slots to adjust the number of slots in the chassis.

What do you want to do?

View or change slot and module settings

To view settings for a slot in the chassis, select the appropriate slot in the configuration tree.

Select a custom FPGA personality for the chassis

To view or chage the FPGA configuration of the chassis, select User Variables in the configuration tree.
